name: 指尖车手 快手小游戏
name_original: 指尖车手 快手小游戏
description:
Very interesting fingertip manipulation game, through the manipulation of the fingers, let the car follow the designated line.
The steering wheel can be rotated 360 degrees. You can navigate through corners with flexible controls. The car ends the game if it touches the edge of the road.
The farther you go, the higher your score will be!
